name: CompassTest
description: Tests for the Compass class in the BaseFaker library, focusing on various compass direction methods.

test_cases.name: compassDirectionWordWithCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the word method of the Compass class with a specific CompassPoint.

test_cases.name: compassDirectionWordWithoutCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the word method of the Compass class without a specific CompassPoint.

test_cases.name: compassDirectionAbbreviationWithCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the abbreviation method of the Compass class with a specific CompassPoint.

test_cases.name: compassDirectionAbbreviationWithoutCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the abbreviation method of the Compass class without a specific CompassPoint.

test_cases.name: compassAzimuthWithCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the azimuth method of the Compass class with a specific CompassPoint.

test_cases.name: compassAzimuthWithoutCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the azimuth method of the Compass class without a specific CompassPoint.
